subject: RE: [junit] Unit Testing of EJB's in Weblogic Server
msgSnippet: i am new to junit.  Can anybody send me some me some examples / details how to test ejbs with JUnit, please?  Thanks, mohanJAVA@hotmail.com ... From: Pendyala
messageBody:
i am new to junit. Can anybody send me some me some examples / details how
to test ejbs with JUnit, please? Thanks,
mohanJAVA@...

-----Original Message-----
From: Pendyala Lakshmana [mailto:pendyala.l@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2001 6:19 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Unit Testing of EJB's in Weblogic Server


> Hi
>
In our current project we are planning to use junit for unit testing of EJB
Components. We know the procedure of testing the EJB Components in J2EE
Server using Junit framework. But we are not sure that whether we can use
junit testing framework in weblogic5.1 Application Server where in actually
we are deploying our beans.

I will be very grateful to you if you can mail us how to do unit testing
using Junit in Weblogic Server. Can you mail us information about where we
can get find this stuff on the net?
>
> Thanking you ,
>
> Regards,
>
> Lakshmana Kumar PVNK
